snippet.title: Enigma Prison - #2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Second gameplay trailer for #enigmaprison
Early development footage

FAQ:

-When the game will be released?-
2017

-Which game engine you are using?-
Unreal Engine 4

-Are you really doing this game alone?-
Yes :)

-Which languages the game will have?-
English
Brazilian Portuguese

-Which platforms the game will run?-
PC (Windows)

-Is there plans for a console release?-
After the steam release, if the community shows interest I will definitely do it


Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/enigmaprison
Twitter: https://twitter.com/enigmaprison
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/enigmaprison
